original: 交州廣信人，士燮之弟。曾受丁宮之邀，入朝為官，不久就因董卓之亂而出逃歸鄉。交州刺史朱符被殺後，士燮任命士壹為合浦太守。
text: Jiaozhou Guangxin people, brother of Shixie. Once invited by the Ding Palace, he entered the dynasty as an official, and soon fled back home due to Dong Zhuo's rebellion. After Jiaozhou Governor Zhu Fu was killed, Shi Xie appointed Shi Yi as the prefect of Hepu.
